osx.command: mkdir -p build/Debug && clang++ *.cpp -o build/app -framework GLUT -framework OpenGL -DGL_SILENCE_DEPRECATION -g && ln -sf ../app build/Debug/outDebug

linux.command: mkdir -p build/Debug && g++ *.cpp -o build/app -lglut -lGL -lGLU -g && ln -sf ../app build/Debug/outDebug

windows.command: if not exist build\Debug mkdir build\Debug && g++ *.cpp -o build\app.exe -I"C:\freeglut\include" -L"C:\freeglut\lib" -lfreeglut -lopengl32 -lglu32 -g && copy build\app.exe build\Debug\outDebug.exe
